Name: Monster Killer
About the game: Monster Killer - it is a first-person shooter where you act as a fearless sniper, controlling the scope help the monster hunter, clear all locations. Hone your skills by collecting bonuses for killing and go to the next level. Each kill will bring you closer to a new record and the next level. Become a hunter of monsters that have filled the nearby territory of the city. They will do anything to hide in the most secluded corners of the beautiful landscape. Clear all locations and become a hero of your time. Feature of game: - Complexity - Reaction Training - Nice Pixel-Art
